page.title: 09Annual Events In Whitby.
page.content: The 3 Day{Whitby Regatta}has been held in August for over 100 years. There are rowing and yacht races,a decorated float procession, a funfair and market and many community events. { Folk Week}attracts many top folk artists to the town. The{Blessing of the Boats}is an outdoor religious service on Tate Hill Pier.The planting of the{Penny Hedge {is a medieval}custom regarding land rights.The willow hedge has to withstand three tides from the River Esk. Whitby Lions run various charity events, two of which are the{Pram Race and the{Boxing Day Dip.}The{Lifeboat,} the{Hospital}and the{Schools}all hold their annual fund raising days which are supported by locals and visitors.
